name: Performapal Teeter Totter Hopper
desc: The first time this Special Summoned card would be destroyed by battle each turn, it is not destroyed. Once per turn, during your opponent's End Phase: You can target 1 Level 3 or lower "Performapal" monster in your Graveyard; send this card to the Graveyard, and if you do, add that monster to your hand. If a "Performapal" monster is sent from the hand to your Graveyard (except during the Damage Step), while this card is in your Graveyard: You can Special Summon this card. You can only use this effect of "Performapal Teeter Totter Hopper" once per turn.
